text: "Electric Blue" is a 1987 song by Australian new wave band Icehouse and is the second single from their fifth studio album Man of Colours. It went to number 1 in Australia, number 4 in New Zealand, number 7 in the United States, number 10 in Canada, number 53 in the United Kingdom and number 83 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== 7-inch and US cassette single :A. "Electric Blue" :B. "Over My Head" Australian 12-inch and cassette single # "Electric Blue" (12-inch) # "Electric Blue" (7-inch) # "Electric Blue" (dub version mix) # "Over My Head" UK 12-inch single :A1.
